abstract: Facebook has acquired the team behind Gowalla, a location-based mobile application, and will relocating its members to its headquarters. Gowalla competed with Foursquare but then became more of a social travel guide. Financial terms were not disclosed.

lead_paragraph: 2:11 p.m. | Updated  Adding background information and details of the deal.

headline.main: Facebook Acquires Gowalla, a Location-Based Social Service
